column2: "When I was looking through the shops, I found a pendant made from white flowers in transparent crystals. I wanted it, but it was so expensive..."
"If I had some flowers from the forest of Planet Naberius, I could make my own pendant just like that one."
"I can't buy it, so I want to go and gather some... But I promised that I wouldn't go out on my own..."
"(<%me>, we should be able to go to Naberius if we accept a Free Exploration mission.)"

"(Those white flowers Akhtar was talking about...
Let's get some for her as a present!)"
